text: Bert van de Kamp (8 March 1947 â€“ 9 April 2020) was a Dutch music journalist. He was known for his interviews with pop stars in the Dutch Muziekkrant OOR. He was born in Rotterdam. In 1972 van de Kamp won the prize: Wordt Popjournalist en Vlieg naar Londen!. From 1973 to 1977 he was writer of Muziekkrant OOR. He wrote about many music styles; of hardrock to singer- songwriters. From 1977 to 1980 he was correspondent in London for Muziekkrant OOR and the KRO radio and television magazine Studio. In 1995 he won the first . Kamp died in Utrecht on 9 April 2020, aged 73.Voormalig OOR-redacteur Bert van de Kamp overleden , OOR.nl, 10 April 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website * Music lists of Bert van de Kamp (1973-2004.
